subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chase Headley, acquired from the Padres in exchange for Yangervis Solarte and the minor league pitcher Rafael De Paula, singled in the winning run with one out in the 14th.
snippet: Chase Headley, acquired from the Padres in exchange for Yangervis Solarte and the minor league pitcher Rafael De Paula, singled in the winning run with one out in the 14th.
